meanings.definition: A food made of lean meat that has been dried and pounded into a paste with fat and berries.
meanings.sent1: The pemmicans were a staple food for the explorers on their long journey.
meanings.sent2: Hunters in the past used pemmicans as a convenient source of energy.
meanings.sent3: The pemmicans were so tasty that even the pickiest eater couldn't resist.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of pemmicans filled the air, tempting everyone around.
meanings.sent5: The colorful pemmicans looked like little energy-packed nuggets.

meanings.definition: A type of preserved food made from dried meat and fat.
meanings.sent1: The pemmicans stored in the pantry were a lifesaver during the winter storm.
meanings.sent2: The pioneers relied on pemmicans to sustain them during their travels.
meanings.sent3: The pemmicans in the jar seemed to whisper, 'Eat me!'
meanings.sent4: The pemmicans were like time capsules of flavor, preserving the taste of the past.
meanings.sent5: Opening the bag of pemmicans released a burst of savory goodness.
